segments.text: Oh man, look at that sink gushing water everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's right there, but she's oblivious, just polishing that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's spilling onto the floor, making a huge puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If she steps wrong, she'll slip and fall hard.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now the kids are up to no good on that shaky stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's stretching so far, one hand in the cookie jar, the other holding a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool is tilting back, it's dangerous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting, reaching up like she expects a treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: No one's watching them, this could end badly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cabinets are getting soaked, what a mess that's going to be.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, the garden is all calm and pretty, such a contrast.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope someone notices before it's too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is making me nervous just watching.
segments.speaker: PAR
